Package de.lases.business.service

Class ReviewService

java.lang.Object
de.lases.business.service.ReviewService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@Dependent public class ReviewService extends Object implements Serializable
Provides functionality for dealing with reviews of submission papers. In case of an unexpected state, a UIMessage event will be fired.
See Also:
Serialized Form

      public ReviewService()

  • Method Details

    • get

      public Review get​(Review review)
      Gets a Review.
      Parameters:
      review - The requested Review containing a valid id.
      Returns:
      The fully filled requested Review.

    • change

      public void change​(Review newReview)
      Updates a Review.
      Parameters:
      newReview - A fully filled Review.

      All fields filled with legal values will be overwritten. It should contain an existing id value.

    • add

      public void add​(Review review, FileDTO file)
      Adds a Review to a Submission.

      The Review will always be added to the latest Paper. It has to be submitted within the given timeline and one reviewer can only submit one Review per Paper.

      Parameters:
      review - The Review that is submitted. Must be filled with a valid reviewerId, paperVersion and submissionId.
      file - The FileDTO containing the pdf review itself..

    • remove

      public void remove​(Review review, User user)
      Removes a Review.

      If the User removing the review is not the reviewer himself an email will be dispatched to the reviewer informing him about this action. The EmailUtil utility will be used for this.

      Parameters:
      review - The Review that is to be removed. Must be filled with a valid reviewerId, paperId and submissionId.
      user - The User who removes the Review. Must contain a valid id.

    • getList

      public List<Review> getList​(Submission submission, User user, ResultListParameters resultListParameters)
      Gets all Reviews that can be viewed by a given User. For example, a reviewer can only view his own reviews.
      Parameters:
      submission - The Submission from which the reviews are requested.
      user - The User who requests to see the Reviews.
      resultListParameters - The parameters, that control filtering and sorting of the resulting list.
      Returns:
      The requested reviews, which the given user is allowed to view.

    • getFile

      public FileDTO getFile​(Review review)
      Gets the FileDTO containing the Review's pdf.
      Parameters:
      review - The Review containing the requested file. Must contain a valid id.
      Returns:
      The requested File.
